The '''Venerable Jadestone Turtle''' is a turtle that can be found in [[Chenyu Vale]]. Despite being a living being, it is not listed in the living beings [[archive]] category and there is only one of it.

==Location==
<gallery>
HEO Location Feast for a Venerable Turtle.png
</gallery>

After completing the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Feast for a Venerable Turtle]]'', the Venerable Jadestone Turtle can be found either resting on land (alongside two [[Jadestone Turtle]]s) or in the water nearby, with up to {{Item|Clearwater Jade|x=6}} on its back.
